front.title: QUIC Loss Detection and Congestion Control

abstract.t: This document describes loss detection and congestion control mechanisms for QUIC. Note to Readers Discussion of this draft takes place on the QUIC working group mailing list (quic@ietf.org), which is archived at https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/search/?email_list=quic . Working Group information can be found at https://github.com/quicwg ; source code and issues list for this draft can be found at https://github.com/quicwg/base-drafts/labels/recovery .
